title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and a y axis representing Percentage of respondents.
The highest category is found at Spam/phishing_emails where Percentage of respondents is 67.0.
The lowest category is found at Malicious_websites/web_ads where Percentage of respondents is 16.0.
gold: This statistic depicts the leading causes of ransomware infections according to MSPs worldwide in 2019 . According to the survey , 67 percent of responding MSPs indicated that phishing scams were the most common cause of ransomware infection .
